text: Hagi Nagri vahe'ma Negevi kazigama nemaniza vahe'mo'za vu'za, Idomu agona mopama me'neana omeri'za umanigahaze. Juda mopafima me'nea agona ramimofo asoparegama nemaniza vahe'mo'za, Filistia vahe'mokizmi agupo mopa erigahaze. Ana nehu'za Efraemi naga'mokizmi hoza mopane, Sameria vahe'mokizmi mopanena ete eri nafa'a nehanage'za, Benzameni naga'mo'za Gileati mopa ome eri'za manigahaze.
